node.text:
Where else but at The Tides can you get the catch of the day from the Arabian Sea grilled, steamed or pan-fried! And that too with a choice of marinades like Aglio Olio Limoncino, Chimichurri, Kumarakom Masala or Pattaya Rub. All that yumminess is paired with stir-fried Asian vegetables, steamed rice or spiced potato wedges.

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
